entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Delson

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of light snow or freezing drizzle this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
